name: Destiny HERO - Double Dude
desc: Cannot be Special Summoned. This card can attack twice during each Battle Phase. During your Standby Phase, if this card was destroyed since your last Standby Phase: You can Special Summon 2 "Double Dude Tokens" (Warrior-Type/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1000). This card must be in your Graveyard to activate and to resolve this effect.
